item.title: Home office ergonomics — with TensorFlow
item.description: Home office ergonomics — with TensorFlow Monitor good posture — with machine learning. Ensure proper office ergonomics with TensorFlow, a webcam and OpenCV Python real-time computer vision libraries. Code available at https://github.com/saubury/posture-watch Real-time posture monitoring — as demonstrated with a teddy bear If you sit behind a desk for hours at a time, you’re possibly going to slump. This may result in neck and back pain. This can be avoided by teaching a machine to recognise “good” posture from “bad” posture.
